remarks: The evaluation map has the intended behavior on the generators. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
statement:
frmdup.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdup.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
frmdup.e $e |- E = ( x e. Word I |-> ( G gsum ( A o. x ) ) ) $.
frmdup.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
frmdup.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. X ) $.
frmdup.a $e |- ( ph -> A : I --> B ) $.
frmdup2.u $e |- U = ( varFMnd ` I ) $.
frmdup2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. I ) $.
frmdup2 $p |- ( ph -> ( E ` ( U ` Y ) ) = ( A ` Y ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d G x $.
$d I x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
